channel.title: Insurance on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Insurance on FinanClub

item.title: BBD
item.description: score:109 Chances: Banco Bradesco SA is showing potential for growth and expansion in the Latin American market. The company’s recent dividend announcement indicates positive financial performance and sustainability. Brazil’s economic outlook and falling interest rates in the United States present favorable conditions for Bradesco’s public offerings.

item.title: MFC
item.description: score:246 Chances: Manulife Financial Corp. has recently announced a reinsurance transaction with Global Atlantic, indicating a strategic move to de-risk its long-term care business and release capital for potential shareholder activities. The company’s appointment to the Dow Jones Sustainability North America Index reflects its leading sustainable business practices and long-term shareholder value creation.
